page.title: 09FISHING WITH MY DAD
page.content: MY DAD IS A FISHERMAN. HE FISHES FOR PRAWNS IN A BOAT WITH MY UNCLE. THE NAME OF THE BOAT IS FRAMS BRO 1. I WENT FISHING WITH MY DAD,AND I THREW FISH TO THE SEAGULLS. I HAVE TO WEAR A SAFETY HARNESS WHEN I GO ON THE BOAT. I DO NOT LIKE THE BOAT BECAUSE I FEEL SEA-SICK. MY DAD DOES NOT CATCH MUCH FISH, IF HE DOES, HE USES IT FOR BAIT. MY DAD HELPED TO BUILD THE FISH FARM CAGES. THEY GROW SALMON IN THE CAGES. THEY HAVE JUST LANDED THE FIRST LOAD. IT WAS TAKEN BY LORRY TO INVERNESS AND SENT BY AIR TO AMERICA. MY DAD GOES FISHING A 6.30. A.M. AND COMES HOME AT 5 P.M. THE PRAWNS ARE TAKEN TO THE VILLAGE BY MY UNCLE AND THEN PICKED UP BY THE LORRY AND TAKEN TO GAIRLOCH.
